name: Tech Upgrades for Rocky Mount (The Franklin News-Post)
description: Coverage of major decisions made during a town council meeting in Rocky Mount, Virginia.

name: Local author releases book of poetry (The Franklin News-Post)
description: A profile on a local author who writes poetry about Smith Mountain Lake.

name: Where is our corn palace? (The Franklin News-Post)
description: An editorial in which I argue that the local high school should host its prom in the town's performance center.

name: Beijing Pizza Cup (The Beijinger)
description: Some of the best days of my life: being paid to eat pizza in Beijing and write about why it deserves an award.

name: Throwback Thursday: A Throwback to a Throwback (The Beijinger)
description: Part of a weekly series in which we write about our old writing at The Beijinger. The blog is very informal, and thus so is my voice.

name: Virginia Dare Cruises (social media marketing copy)
description: Short, snappy, conversational posts on Facebook to encourage conversation and, more importantly, purchases.

name: The Ambassador of downtown Harrisonburg (The Breeze)
description:
A profile of a young music lover with Williams Syndrome in Harrisonburg, Virginia.
This story won an award for feature writing from the Virginia Press Association.

name: The Ghosts of the Bear Paws (The Havre Daily News)
description: A fun little feature on a disappearing community in the foothills of northern Montana.
